name: Exit
summary_text: A rock climber tries to save the day when a mysterious white gas envelops an entire district in Seoul, South Korea.

name: The Bachelors
summary_text: After the early death of his wife, a mourning father moves with his teenage son across the country for a private school teaching job. Their lives begin to transform due to two unique women, who help them embrace life and love again.

name: The Beast
summary_text: In order to inherit a fortune a young woman agrees to marry a young man. She soon discovers that his family harbours a dark past involving a monstrous beast.

name: Objective, Burma!
summary_text: A platoon of special ops are tasked to parachute into the remote Burmese jungle and destroy a strategic Japanese radar station, but getting out isn't as easy.

name: Fabricated City
summary_text: After Kwon, an exceptional gamer, is wrongly framed for murder, he along with his allies decides to find the real culprit and prove his innocence.

name: The Count of Monte-Cristo
summary_text: A young officer, falsely imprisoned by his jealous "friends," escapes and uses a hidden treasure to exact his revenge.

name: Flora & Ulysses
summary_text: When Flora rescues a squirrel she names Ulysses, she is amazed to discover he possesses unique superhero powers, which take them on an adventure of humorous complications that ultimately change Flora's life and her outlook forever.

name: The Oath
summary_text: In a politically divided America, a man struggles to make it through the Thanksgiving holiday without destroying his family.

name: MacArthur
summary_text: Biopic of General Douglas MacArthur covering his war exploits during WW2 and the Korean War.

name: Sarbjit
summary_text: Biopic of Sarabjit Singh, a farmer residing at Bhikiwind, Punjab, near the Indo-Pak border, crossed the border after having a couple of drinks. However, he was mistaken to be an Indian spy and was sentenced with capital punishment.

name: The Grilling
summary_text: A police inspector, suspecting an attorney of two child sex murders, has him held for a questioning session that goes on for hours.

name: Something Useful
summary_text: Why would someone like Leyla go to a high school reunion dinner? And take an overnight train to get there. After all, she hasn't been to a single one for the last 25 years - What is Canan, ...                See full summary »

name: Not Fade Away
summary_text: Set in suburban New Jersey in the 1960s, a group of friends form a rock band and try to make it big.

name: One Deadly Summer
summary_text: Oozing sensuality, a young woman arrives in a small town and gets married to the local mechanic. Was it love at first sight? What links her enigmatic presence to the family's piano? Is it curiosity or is it something far more sinister?

name: Le Plaisir
summary_text: Three separate stories about the same thing: le plaisir (pleasure).

name: Les vampires
summary_text: An intrepid reporter and his loyal friend battle a bizarre secret society of criminals known as The Vampires.

name: The Scarlet Pimpernel
summary_text: Paris, 1792: After France becomes a republic, aristocrats are guillotined. The English Sir Percy tries to save as many as he can as The Scarlet Pimpernel in disguises.

name: Ta Ra Rum Pum
summary_text: Ace car racer RV and his wife have the world at their feet. But he has an accident and his world is turned upside down. Can he reclaim his lost glory?

name: St. Agatha
summary_text: In the 1950s in small-town Georgia, a pregnant young woman named Agatha seeks refuge in a convent.

name: Zapped
summary_text: When Zoey's mom remarries, Zoey finds it hard adjusting to her new life - no longer the only kid in the family.

name: Buddy
summary_text: Kristoffer is a billboard hanger, 24 years old and carefree. When his girlfriend Elisabeth dumps him for the boss of her trend bureau, his life falls into pieces. He feels like a loser. By ...                See full summary »

name: The Merchant of Four Seasons
summary_text: Hans Epp is a self-destructive man who lives a dissatisfied life. He tries to find meaning as a fruit vendor, but a heart attack impedes his ability to work, which turns his dissatisfaction into despair.

name: Natural City
summary_text: In the year 2080, the world is connected by a massive computer network. Combiners have developed a process that allows them to merge the souls of human and machine/cyborg, wreaking havoc in...                See full summary »

name: Lady Chatterley
summary_text: A French adaptation of the second (and much less well-known) version of D.H. Lawrence's erotic tale.

name: The Incredibly True Adventure of Two Girls in Love
summary_text: An adventurous love story between two young women of different social and economic backgrounds who find themselves going through all the typical struggles of a new romance.

name: Pyaar Kiya To Darna Kya
summary_text: Muskaan (Kajol) is an orphan girl living on a farm run by her overly-protective older brother, Vishal (Arbaaz Khan) and their 'Chachu' (Dharmendra). Muskaan's childhood friend, Ujaala (...                See full summary »

name: Even Money
summary_text: Gambling addiction bring the stories of three otherwise unconnected people together as it destroys each of their lives.

name: Main Prem Ki Diwani Hoon
summary_text: This is the story of Sanjana, a girl of today's generation full of life and vibrant ecstasy. She lives life on her own terms and gets very upset when her mother Susheela, arranges for her to see a boy leading to a marriage prospect.

name: The Brothers
summary_text: Four friends begin to question women and relationships when one of them announces impending nuptials.

name: Lawman
summary_text: A lawman from Bannock arrives in Sabbath to arrest all the cattlemen whose wild celebration the year before resulted in the accidental death of an old man.

name: Pure
summary_text: Katarina is 20 years old. With a troubled past in a dreary suburb, her life seems to be already set in stone - until she discovers music. Everything changes when she hears a performance of ...                See full summary »

name: The Trial of Joan of Arc
summary_text: A Joan of Arc's trial reconstruction concerning her imprisonment, interrogation and final execution at the hands of the English. Filmed in a spare, low-key fashion.

name: Be With You
summary_text: Woo Jin takes care of his son Ji Ho alone after his wife Soo A passed away. Before she passed away, she promised she would be back on a rainy day one year later. One year later, Soo A appears again, but she does not remember anything.

name: Tonî Takitani
summary_text: When technical illustrator Tony Takitani asks his wife to resist her all-consuming obsession for designer clothes, the consequences are tragic.

name: The Magic of Ordinary Days
summary_text: Pregnant out of wedlock, an educated young woman is pressured by her father into an arranged marriage with a lonely farmer in this drama set during WWII.

name: Grizzly
summary_text: An eighteen-foot-tall grizzly bear terrorizes a state park, leaving it up to a Park Ranger to save the day.

name: A Tale of Winter
summary_text: Five years after losing touch with a summer fling, a woman has difficulty choosing between her two suitors.

name: Xiao quan guai zhao
summary_text: A young man whose sickly grandfather has taught him a secret form of Kung Fu, starts to make a living off of his unique fighting style, only to attract the attention of his grandfather's mortal enemy.

name: Perdida
summary_text: A policewoman, whose childhood friend disappeared in Patagonia years ago, starts a new search to find answers and soon finds her own life in danger.

name: Justin Bieber: All Around the World
summary_text: The special will feature music performances and documentary footage as Justin Bieber embarks on his tour in support of his album Believe.

name: Tuff Turf
summary_text: The new kid in school must battle a gang of street toughs after stealing the gang leader's girl.

name: Summertime
summary_text: A young woman moves from the French countryside to Paris and begins a passionate love affair with a feminist leader in this drama set in 1970s France.

name: The Pit and the Pendulum
summary_text: Horror film set in 1492 Toledo, Spain, depicting the cruel deeds of a monk named Torquemada, Grand Inquisitor of the Spanish Inquisition.

name: The Prize
summary_text: As the Nobel Prize winners come to Stockholm to receive their awards, their lives are overturned and perturbed in various ways.

name: Johnny Belinda
summary_text: A kind doctor volunteers to tutor a deaf-mute woman, but scandal starts to swirl when his pupil is raped and falls pregnant.

name: Drive Hard
summary_text: A former race car driver is abducted by a mysterious thief and forced to be the wheel-man for a crime that puts them both in the sights of the cops and the mob.

name: Cavemen
summary_text: Four men share an ex factory loft in LA. Dean is a romantic wannabe screenwriter. The others are cavemen preoccupied with getting laid. Tess is their platonic friend.

name: Apaharan
summary_text: Story of a tumultuous and complex relationship between a father (Mohan Agashe) and son (Ajay Devgan), set against the backdrop of a thriving kidnapping industry in the Hindi heartland of Bihar.

name: Les chevaliers du ciel
summary_text: An advanced, armed, French Mirage fighter jet is stolen during an air show in UK. 2 other fighter jets locate it. They're forced to shoot it down. Terrorists make another attempt to steal armed Mirages. Why?

name: No End
summary_text: The wife of the recently deceased lawyer tries to cope with grief after his loss and to keep his last case going in court.

name: Paradise: Faith
summary_text: A single woman in her 50s devotes her vacations to doing Catholic missionary work in Vienna, descending into violent self-punishment as part of her faith.

name: Cannonball!
summary_text: Racing across the country from L.A. to New York, a plethora of exotic cars carry contestants hoping to win a very large sum.

name: Across the Pacific
summary_text: In December 1941, ex-army captain Rick Leland boards a Japanese ship heading to Asia via the Panama Canal where his Japanese hosts show interest in the American defense plans for the canal zone.

name: The Most Hated Family in America
summary_text: Louis meets the Phelps family, who protest against an America that tolerates homosexuality

name: Frankenstein Must Be Destroyed
summary_text: Baron Frankenstein, with the aid of a young doctor and his fiancée, kidnaps the mentally sick Dr. Brandt in order to perform the first brain transplant operation.

name: Mission of Honor
summary_text: The exploits of 303 Squadron RAF during the Battle of Britain. The squadron consisted of Polish pilots, many of whom were veterans of the air battles involved in Germany's invasion of Poland.

name: The Whales of August
summary_text: Two aged sisters reflect on life and the past during a late summer day in Maine.

name: The Silent Revolution
summary_text: A group of twelfth-grade pupils decide to show their solidarity with the victims of the 1956 Hungarian uprising by staging two minutes of silence during lessons.

name: Route Irish
summary_text: The story of a private security contractor in Iraq who rejected the official explanation of his friend's death and sets out to discover the truth.

name: Illang: The Wolf Brigade
summary_text: Set in the distant future where both North and South Koreas agree to establish a joint government, which has been in preparation for a duration of 7 years, the plot focuses on political ...                See full summary »

name: Fatso
summary_text: Overweight loner Rino spends his days in seclusion, until his dad rents a room to an overtly sexual girl who challenges Rino to break down his walls.

name: La belle verte
summary_text: The "Green Planet" belongs to another solar system. Through the simplicity of their lifestyle those who live there are a real step ahead of us: they spend their time concentrating their ...                See full summary »

name: Çalgi Çengi Ikimiz
summary_text: Gurkan and Salih tries to get out of the mafia which they were accidentally participated in first movie. But this time they have to deal with even funnier situations.

name: Yeh Dillagi
summary_text: A poor girl is rebuked by a rich boy. She leaves town to return successful and rich. He falls for her but his brother is already in love with the girl.

name: No Man's Land
summary_text: A rookie cop goes undercover and infiltrates a car thief ring.

name: Rabid Dogs
summary_text: Following a bungled robbery, three violent criminals take a young woman, a middle-aged man, and a child hostage and force them to drive them outside Rome to help them make a clean escape.

name: Face
summary_text: In the face of demise in his values, a socialist in England decides to form a gang and rob banks for a living.

name: Sabse Bada Khiladi
summary_text: A police officer impersonates his murdered twin brother in order to bring his killers to justice.

name: 5 Fingers
summary_text: During WWII the valet to the British Ambassador to Ankara sells British secrets to the Germans while trying to romance a refugee Polish countess.

name: Frenemies
summary_text: Three sets of friends deal with the ups and downs of their ever-changing relationships.

name: A Christmas Kiss
summary_text: After a spontaneous kiss, a struggling designer ends up falling in love with her demanding boss's boyfriend as she decorates his home for a Christmas party.

name: When Nietzsche Wept
summary_text: Viennese doctor Josef Breuer meets with philosopher Friedrich Nietzsche to help him deal with his despair.

name: Drogówka
summary_text: Comic and tragic scenes from the lives of police officers in the Warsaw Traffic Department.

name: Winter Sleepers
summary_text: Setting in a small mountain town, a man, looking for revenge because of his daughter's accidentally killing, mistakenly track out a young couple, troubling with their ordinary life problems.

name: Ten Little Indians
summary_text: Ten people are invited to a luxury mountaintop mansion, only to find that an unseen person is killing them one by one. Could one of them be the killer?

name: Meri Pyaari Bindu
summary_text: A successful writer Abhimanyu Roy, stuck with writers block, returns to his roots to write an old-fashioned love story.

name: Cemetery of Splendor
summary_text: A group of soldiers in a small town on the Mekong River in northern Thailand are struck with a bizarre sleeping illness.

name: 18 Again!
summary_text: An aging ruthless businessman swaps bodies with his grandson in the wake of getting into a car accident.

name: Curtains
summary_text: Six young actresses auditioning for a movie role at a remote mansion are targeted by a mysterious masked murderer.

name: Empire of the Ants
summary_text: Con artist Marilyn Fryser tries to sell bogus real estate deals in an area overrun by giant ants.

name: Mitchell
summary_text: A tough, slobby, honest cop tries to simultaneously take down heroin dealers and a corrupt businessman who murdered a burglar, even if it costs him his life. This obscure film became infamous after Mystery Science Theater 3000 (1988) riffed on it.

name: Panipat
summary_text: The film is based on the third battle of Panipat which took place on the 14 of January in 1761 between the Marathas and the King of Afghanistan, Ahmad Shah Abdali.

name: Kabluey
summary_text: A loser moves in with his brother's (in Iraq) wife to look after her two evil sons. She gets him a job wearing a Kabluey costume.

name: 36 China Town
summary_text: A wealthy casino owner is murdered in her mansion at 36, China Town and the investigating detective uncovers multiple suspects, all with independent motives to commit the crime.

name: I Live in Fear
summary_text: An aging Japanese industrialist becomes so fearful of nuclear war that it begins to take a toll on his life and family.

name: Harpoon
summary_text: Rivalries, dark secrets, and sexual tension emerge when three best friends find themselves stranded on a yacht in the middle of the ocean desperate for survival.

name: Audacity
summary_text: "Audacity" uses a unique approach to address a very sensitive subject in contemporary society. Regardless of your views on the gay lifestyle, you'll gain fresh insights and a new perspective.

name: George Carlin: Life Is Worth Losing
summary_text: George Carlin continues making people laugh with his 13th HBO stand-up special.

name: For a Lost Soldier
summary_text: Set in The Netherlands at the end of WW II, this touching story, told in flashbacks, explores the complex and romantic relationship between an adult soldier and a displaced, lonely adolescent boy.

name: La ardilla roja
summary_text: Jota is about to commit suicide. As he fighting against himself, trying to jump off a bridge, a girl riding a motorcycle falls off the bridge. He runs to help her, and goes with her to the ...                See full summary »

name: Viva la libertà
summary_text: When a politician disappears, his (mad) twin brother is brought to replace him.

name: Return of the Fly
summary_text: Philippe Delambre, the now-adult son of "The Fly", does some transportation experimentation of his own.

name: The In Crowd
summary_text: A mentally disturbed young woman takes a job at a posh country club and falls in with a clique of wealthy college kids where she's taken under the wing of the clique's twisted leader, who harbors some dark secrets too terrifying to tell.

name: The Very Thought of You
summary_text: 3 childhood friends all separately fall for cute American Martha and within 3 days of her arrival at a London airport, their friendship is at risk.

name: My Boyfriend's Back
summary_text: A teenage boy comes back from the dead because he is determined to win the most beautiful girl in school.

name: Despite Everything
summary_text: 4 quite different sisters, all with their own little secrets, attend their mom's funeral in Madrid. The will reveals that their dad is not their biological dad and they are sent on a quest together for their bio dads.

name: Turetskiy gambit
summary_text: The film is based on the second book from the Adventures of Erast Petrovich Fandorin series of novels written by the Russian author Boris Akunin. The film takes place in 1877 during the ...                See full summary »

name: The Toxic Avenger Part III: The Last Temptation of Toxie
summary_text: Toxie finds he has nothing to do as a superhero, as he has ridden his city of evil. He decides to go to work for a major corporation, which he discovers may be the evilest of all his adversaries.

name: Las Vampiras
summary_text: An erotic horror tale about a vixen vampiress seducing and killing women to appease her insatiable thirst for female blood.

name: Tuesdays with Morrie
summary_text: A journalist finds himself questioning his own life when his best friend, a dying man, offers him some very powerful wisdom and advice for coping in relationships, careers and society.

name: Twin Murders: The Silence of the White City
summary_text: A cop returns to the job. A serial killer too returns to the job.

name: The Groomsmen
summary_text: A groom (Ed Burns) and his four attendants wrestle with issues related to friendship and maturity a week before the big day.

name: Gosnell: The Trial of America's Biggest Serial Killer
summary_text: A movie about the crimes and trial of Kermit Gosnell, an American doctor and abortion provider who was convicted of killing three fetuses and the involuntary manslaughter of a woman who died during a procedure.

name: Fly Me to the Moon 3D
summary_text: Three young houseflies stow away aboard the Apollo 11 flight to the moon.

name: Chori Chori Chupke Chupke
summary_text: A prostitute agrees to get impregnated and then give the baby to a couple (Raj and Priya) in exchange for a million rupees. Everything changes when she develops feelings for the baby and Raj.

name: Oxygen
summary_text: Two guys kidnap the wife of a rich man and bury her in a box with 24 hours of oxygen. Tough NYPD Detective Maddy and others get the case. Will they get to her in time?

name: Thieves Like Us
summary_text: When two men break out of prison, they join up with another and restart their criminal ways, robbing banks across the South.

name: Parasyte: Part 1
summary_text: The humanity is suffering from murders all over the globe, called "Mincemeat murders". High school student, Izumi Shinichi has a parasite living off him, having replaced his right hand, and he might be the discoverer of truth.

name: Jjakpae
summary_text: After their childhood friend is murdered, a two-man martial arts army beats a path to the perp.

name: Rokugatsu no hebi
summary_text: A woman is being stalked by a stranger. His stalking turns to blackmail when he sends her copies of photos of her in an embarrassing position. Now he controls her and she has to do anything he says. Anything.

name: Su Zhou he
summary_text: The river Suzhou that flows through Shanghai is a reservoir of filth, chaos and poverty, but also a meeting place for memories and secrets. Lou Ye, who spent his youth on the banks of the ...                See full summary »

name: 10.000 Km
summary_text: Alex moves to Los Angeles for a new job; Sergi stays in Barcelona. They love each other, but maintaining a relationship through technology proves challenging.

name: Ultras
summary_text: Naples. At almost fifty years old Sandro is the leader of the Apache, a group of ultras with whom he has spent his whole life at the stadium: a life of violence, clashes, passions, and ...                See full summary »

name: Kick
summary_text: An adrenaline junkie's quest for kicks leads him to a life of crime.

name: Cheats
summary_text: A group of friends cheat their way through high school.

name: Dog Days
summary_text: A group of interconnected people in Los Angeles are brought together by their lovely canine counterparts.

name: Un heureux événement
summary_text: A happy event or an intimate view of motherhood, sincere and with no taboos.

name: InAPPropriate Comedy
summary_text: In this comedy film, a computer tablet full of the world's most hilariously offensive apps breaks through the borders of political correctness, stirring up cultural anarchy.

name: A City of Sadness
summary_text: The story of a family embroiled in the "White Terror" that was wrought on the Taiwanese people by the Kuomintang government after their arrival from mainland China in the late 1940s.

name: Sweet Dreams
summary_text: The story of Patsy Cline, the velvet-voiced country music singer who died in a tragic plane crash at the height of her fame.

name: Nadodikkattu
summary_text: After losing their jobs in Kerala, Dasan and Vijayan decide to migrate to the Middle East. But they end up in Tamil Nadu where they are mistaken as two CID officers by a group of smugglers.

name: Pippi Longstocking
summary_text: Pippi Longstocking, a super-strong redheaded little girl, moves into her father's house Villa Villekulla, and has adventures with her next-door neighbors Tommy and Annika in this compilation film of the classic European TV series.

name: Dom zly
summary_text: The story takes place in two parallel time planes. The first plot follows the events of one autumn night in 1978. Edward Srodon, a zootechnician, makes an accidental stopover in a farmhouse...                See full summary »

name: The Keeper
summary_text: Roland Sallinger is an LA cop who after nearly being killed by his greedy partner, and eventually being forced to retire for medical reasons, flees to San Antonio, Texas, after being asked ...                See full summary »

name: Watching the Detectives
summary_text: A film noir buff has his life turned on end by a femme fatale with a big adventure in mind.

name: Balzac and the Little Chinese Seamstress
summary_text: Two youths sent for a Maoist "re-education" in the mountains fall in love with the village tailor's granddaughter.

name: Anjaan
summary_text: Krishna comes to Mumbai in search of his brother Raju Bhai, an underworld don. Through Raju Bhai's gangster friends, his past life is revealed. What happened to Raju Bhai? Will Krishna find him?

summary_text: Hukumet Kadin 2 is the second installment of the series. The second film goes back to the year 1949 and follows the journey of the main character Xate and her sons and daughter as she ...                See full summary »

name: Boy Meets Girl
summary_text: Boy Meets Girl is a funny, tender, sex positive romantic comedy that explores what it means to be a real man or woman, and how important it is to live a courageous life not letting fear stand in the way of going after your dreams.

name: Once Upon a Time in the Midlands
summary_text: After seeing his ex-girlfriend (Henderson) turn down a nationally televised marriage proposal, a small-time crook (Carlyle) returns to his hometown to try and win back her heart.

name: Hostile
summary_text: Juliette, a lone survivor of an apocalyptic era, fights to survive against hunger, thirst, a broken leg and strange, disturbing creatures that only come out at nighttime.

name: Hail the Conquering Hero
summary_text: Woodrow is discharged from the military for hay fever, but fabricates receiving a heroic honorable discharge before returning home.

name: Evaru
summary_text: Sub-inspector Vikram Vasudev is entrusted with the task of investigating the murder of a high ranking officer who was killed by his alleged rape victim. When he delves deeper into the case he uncovers some surprising facts.

name: Downhill Racer
summary_text: Quietly cocky Robert Redford joins U.S. ski team as downhill racer and clashes with the team's coach, played by Gene Hackman. Lots of good skiing action leading to an exciting climax.

name: Kardesim Benim
summary_text: Two resentful, singer brothers take a journey with their dead father's old car in order to carry out his bequest which is to sing at a wedding in Urla.

name: Paradise: Hope
summary_text: The final installment in Ulrich Seidl's Paradise trilogy, 'Paradise: Hope' tells the story of overweight thirteen-year-old Melanie and her first love. While her mother travels to Kenya ('...                See full summary »

name: The Robber
summary_text: A story based on Johann Rettenberger, an Austrian marathon runner and a bank robber.

name: The Wild World of Batwoman
summary_text: The pointlessly named Batwoman and her bevy of Batmaidens fight evil and dance.

name: Hon zin
summary_text: The police department has long been untouchable until tonight when hijackers kidnap 5 highly trained officers. Cryptic messages from the hijackers expose a mole within the task force.

name: Still of the Night
summary_text: A Manhattan psychiatrist probes a patient's murder and falls for the victim's mysterious mistress.

name: The Turning Point
summary_text: When her daughter joins a ballet company, a former dancer is forced to confront her long-ago decision to give up the stage to have a family.

name: Goodbye, Dragon Inn
summary_text: On a dark, wet night a historic and regal Chinese cinema sees its final film. Together with a small handful of souls they bid "Goodbye, Dragon Inn."

name: The Gambler
summary_text: Axel Freed is a literature professor. He has the gambling vice. When he has lost all of his money, he borrows from his girlfriend, then his mother, and finally some bad guys that chase him. Despite all of this, he cannot stop gambling.

name: November
summary_text: In a poor Estonian village, a group of peasants use magic and folk remedies to survive the winter, and a young woman tries to get a young man to love her.

name: Fall Break
summary_text: A teenager who accidentally committed matricide finds himself being hunted together with his girlfriend and mates by his now crazed father.

name: The Trip to Bountiful
summary_text: In 1940s Texas, an elderly woman is determined to visit her childhood home for one last time.

name: Raw Deal
summary_text: Joe Sullivan has taken the rap for Rick who double-crosses him with a flawed escape plan and other means intended to get rid of him.

name: Men with Brooms
summary_text: Four men take time from their personal problems to reunite as a curling team and compete in a bonspiel that will restore their honour.

name: Larry David: Curb Your Enthusiasm
summary_text: Mock documentary about Seinfeld writer Larry David featuring contributions from his friends and colleagues. Larry makes a return to stand-up comedy and prepares to film a television special for HBO.

name: Cousins
summary_text: Two couples go to a mutual friend's wedding and end up swapping partners.

name: Cooley High
summary_text: In 1964 on Chicago's Near-North Side, the lives of four carefree high school seniors and best friends, including an aspiring playwright and an all-city basketball champion, takes a tragic turn.

name: How to Succeed in Business Without Really Trying
summary_text: Armed with the titular manual, an ambitious window washer seeks to climb the corporate ladder.

name: The Snare
summary_text: Three friends head to the seafront for a drunken weekend, only to be imprisoned on the top floor of their holiday apartment by a malevolent paranormal force.

name: Traffic
summary_text: The lives of some different people get intertwined when a girl is in urgent need of a heart transplant with the only heart donor being many miles of traffic away.

name: Age of the Dragons
summary_text: Herman Melville's classic novel Moby Dick, is recreated in a world where Captain Ahab and his crew search for a Great White Dragon.

name: Mine 9
summary_text: Two miles into the earth, nine Appalachian miners struggle to survive after a methane explosion leaves them with one hour of oxygen.

name: Petals on the Wind
summary_text: 1970, 10 years after the attic, the 3 siblings' adoptive dad dies. Their bio mom still rejects them. Ballerina Cathy moves in with a ballet dancer in NYC to start a life away from her med student brother/lover.

name: Hush! Girls Don't Scream
summary_text: Shirin is supposed to get married in a couple of hours, but she unexpectedly murders a man. The cause of the crime, rooted in her nightmarish childhood, unravels gradually and the real question emerges: Who is the REAL criminal?

name: What a Way to Go!
summary_text: A four-time widow discusses her four marriages, in which all of her husbands became incredibly rich and died prematurely because of their drive to be rich.

name: Orchestra Rehearsal
summary_text: An orchestra assembles for a rehearsal in an ancient chapel under the inquisitive eyes of a TV documentary crew, but an uprising breaks out.

name: Mother of Mine
summary_text: During World War II, more than 70,000 Finnish children were evacuated to neutral Sweden to avoid the conflict. From the award-winning Klaus Härö (Elina - Som om jag inte fanns (2002)), "...                See full summary »

name: Zana
summary_text: Haunted by her long suppressed past and pressured by family to seek treatment from mystical healers for her infertility, a Kosovar woman struggles to reconcile the expectations of motherhood with a legacy of wartime brutality.

name: Christmas Under Wraps
summary_text: When a doctor doesn't get the position she wanted, she ends up moving to a remote Alaskan town. She unexpectedly ends up finding love, happiness and discovers that the small town is hiding a big holiday secret.

name: The Priest
summary_text: A priest and a police officer are trying to solve a set of mysterious suicides. As their investigation closes in, they discover another crime with even farther-reaching consequences.

name: Pork Chop Hill
summary_text: During the Korean War peace talks, U.S. troops fight to retake a hill from the Communist Chinese forces.

name: Will Penny
summary_text: Aging cowboy Will Penny gets a line camp job on a large cattle spread and finds his isolated cabin is already occupied by a husbandless woman and her young son.

name: Buffaloed
summary_text: In the underworld of debt-collecting, homegrown hustler Peg Dahl will do anything to escape Buffalo, NY.

name: Elephant Song
summary_text: A psychiatrist is drawn into a complex mind game when he questions a disturbed patient about the disappearance of a colleague.

name: Since You Went Away
summary_text: With her husband away to fight in World War II, a housewife must care for their two daughters alone.

name: La gran familia española
summary_text: Five brothers reunite for a wedding at the family estate on the day that Spain plays in the 2010 World Cup final.

name: 800 balas
summary_text: Julián Torralba is a former movie stuntman in Almeria, Spain. He and several of his colleagues, who once made a living in American Westerns shot in Spain, now are reduced to doing stunt ...                See full summary »

name: Imitation of Life
summary_text: A struggling widow and her daughter take in a black housekeeper and her fair-skinned daughter; the two women start a successful business, but face familial, identity, and racial issues along the way.

name: Designing Woman
summary_text: A sportswriter and a fashion-designer marry after a whirlwind romance, and discover they have little in common.

name: Trapeze
summary_text: A crippled circus acrobat is torn emotionally between two ambitious young trapeze artists, one a talented young American and a less-gifted but beautiful Italian.

name: The Long, Long Trailer
summary_text: Nicky and Tacy are going to be married. Nicky wants to save up money for a house, but Tacy dreams of starting off with their own home on wheels--a trailer.

name: The Mudge Boy
summary_text: The film follows the story of Duncan, a fourteen-year-old misfit farm boy trying to fill the void and alleviate the numbness left by his mother's passing. Unable to let her go quite yet, ...                See full summary »

name: Oggatonama
summary_text: The coffin of an expatriate worker with manipulated identity intense the identity crisis when another person's corpse is found inside.

name: All Creatures Big And Small
summary_text: It's the end of the world. A flood is coming. Luckily for Dave and his son Finny, a couple of clumsy Nestrians, an Ark has been built to save all animals. But as it turns out, Nestrians ...                See full summary »

name: Lyubov i golubi
summary_text: Injured on the job Vasily Kuzyakin gets a ticket to the resort. There he meets femme fatale Raisa Zakharovna, and once under the charm, moves to live with her. Unfortunately, a new life is not all that sweet as dreamed hapless Vasily.

name: Snoopy Come Home
summary_text: When Snoopy receives a letter from a girl named Lila, who's in a hospital, he goes on a journey with Woodstock to see her.

name: One-Way to Tomorrow
summary_text: A romantic story of two strangers who come across each other on a journey from Ankara to Izmir.

name: Theodore Rex
summary_text: In an alternate futuristic society, a tough female police detective is paired with a talking dinosaur to find the killer of dinosaurs and other prehistoric animals leading them to a mad scientist bent on creating a new Armageddon.

name: Day of Anger
summary_text: A scruffy garbage boy becomes the pupil of a famed gunfighter, and the stage for confrontation is set when the gunman becomes unhinged and overruns the boy's town through violence and corruption.

name: Alien Hunter
summary_text: An alien black box is found in the South Pole, where a government agency is conducting botanical experiments.

name: The Van
summary_text: Set in the fictional Dublin suburb of Barrytown, Bimbo is a baker who loses his job after being made redundant. Bimbo then acquires the help of his best friend, Larry, to set up a successful burger van.

name: Madar
summary_text: How a mother acts in the hardest parts of her, and her children's lives.

name: The Hollywood Knights
summary_text: Led by their comedic leader, Turk, the Hollywood Knights car club raise hell throughout Beverly Hills on Halloween Night, 1965.

name: Hwayi: A Monster Boy
summary_text: A boy with five fathers who is attached to the criminal underworld. A sinister past is about to be revealed as he is forced to join the killing spree.

name: Extra Terrestrial Visitors
summary_text: A young boy in the woods discovers a lovable alien...or is it?

name: Taylor Swift: Reputation Stadium Tour
summary_text: Taylor Swift takes the stage and proves she doesn't care about her bad reputation.

name: Laal Rang
summary_text: The friendship of two men is tested when things go wrong in their blood theft business.

name: Son of Godzilla
summary_text: A reporter stumbles upon weather experiments on a tropical island, discovering giant mantids, a cast away woman, and an infant monster that Godzilla must adopt and learn to raise as one of his own.

name: Blood Diner
summary_text: Two brothers are entrusted by their uncle to uphold the ritualistic cannibalism of the ancient cult of Sheetar. In order to do so, they have to prepare a feast of sacrifice for the resurrection of their goddess.

name: In This Our Life
summary_text: The day before her wedding, a pampered young woman absconds with her sister's husband; in retaliation, her sister begins seeing the woman's former fiancé.

name: Mr & Mme Adelman
summary_text: For more than 45 years, Sarah and Victor have been together. How did they do it? Who's really Sarah, this enigmatic woman who's always been on the shadow of her husband? Love, ambition and secrets feed this unusual couple's odyssey.

name: Skinwalker Ranch
summary_text: A scientific research team investigates and documents the supernatural phenomena surrounding the disappearance of a cattle ranchers 10 year old son. Inspired by true events that shocked the paranormal community around the world.

name: Black Water: Abyss
summary_text: Five friends exploring a remote cave system in Northern Australia find themselves threatened by a hungry crocodile.

name: The Barrens
summary_text: A man takes his family on a camping trip and becomes convinced they are being stalked by the legendary monster of the New Jersey Pine Barrens: the Jersey Devil.

name: The Evening Star
summary_text: Continuing the story of Aurora Greenway in her latter years. After the death of her daughter, Aurora struggled to keep her family together, but has one grandson in jail, a rebellious ...                See full summary »

name: Mean Dreams
summary_text: Follows Casey and Jonas, two teenagers desperate to escape their broken and abusive homes and examines the desperation of life on the run and the beauty of first love.

name: Don't Kill It
summary_text: An ancient demon terrorizes a tiny Mississippi town.

name: Nelly & Monsieur Arnaud
summary_text: When Nelly, a woman being just divorced, meets by chance M. Arnaud, a mature salesman just retired, begins a strange and special relationship between the two personalities.

name: The Luzhin Defence
summary_text: Two worlds collide when an eccentric genius falls in love with a strong-willed society beauty.

name: Show Dogs
summary_text: Max, a macho, solitary Rottweiler police dog is ordered to go undercover as a primped show dog in a prestigious Dog Show, along with his human partner, to avert a disaster from happening.

name: Bathory: Countess of Blood
summary_text: With an unquenchable thirst for blood, Countess Elizabeth Bathory was one of the most prolific serial killers in history.

name: The Big Sleep
summary_text: Grizzled American private detective in England investigates a complicated case of blackmail turned murder involving a rich but honest elderly general, his two loose socialite daughters, a pornographer and a gangster.

name: The Men
summary_text: A paralyzed war vet tries to adjust to the world without the use of his limbs.

name: Hellboy Animated: Sword of Storms
summary_text: Hellboy travels to Japan to fight an ancient demon.

name: Operation Mekong
summary_text: Inspired by the true story known as the Mekong Massacre--two Chinese commercial vessels are ambushed while traveling down the Mekong River in the waters of the Golden Triangle, one of the largest drug-manufacturing regions in the world. 13 sailors are executed at gunpoint, and 900,000 methamphetamine pills are recovered at the scene. Upon discovery, the Chinese government immediately sends a band...                See full summary »

name: Nova Zembla
summary_text: A Dutch exploration team sets sail to find the North East passage to the Indies. The weather had other ideas for them.

name: Time and Tide
summary_text: A streetwise young man becomes a bodyguard to score quick cash. He befriends a disillusioned mercenary determined to begin life anew. They find themselves working together to foil an assassination attempt, but their partnership can't last.

name: The Shaft
summary_text: When the elevators in New York's 102-story Millennium Building start to malfunction, mechanic Mark Newman is sent to find the cause. After a series of gruesome and deadly "accidents" occur, Mark joins forces with spunky reporter Jennifer.

name: The MacKintosh Man
summary_text: A member of British Intelligence assumes a fictitious criminal identity and allows himself to be caught, imprisoned, and freed in order to infiltrate a spy organization and expose a traitor.

name: Supervixens
summary_text: Clint Ramsey has to leave his job working at Martin Bormann's gas station and flee after his wife is murdered by psycho cop Harry Sledge, who tries to pin the murder on Clint. Crossing ...                See full summary »

name: Kongekabale
summary_text: Election for the Danish parliament is up and the main opposition party has a chance at winning and its leader at becoming the next prime minister. The leader is hospitalized and the scheming begins.

name: Short Sharp Shock
summary_text: Three friends get caught in a life of major crime.

name: Maximum Ride
summary_text: A flock of winged children mount a rescue plan when wolf-boys abduct their youngest member and return her to the militarized institution that created them all.

name: Noviembre
summary_text: Impelled by a spirit which still preserves a patina of idealism, Alfredo arrives in Madrid intent on creating "a performance which is freer, straight from the heart, capable of making ...                See full summary »

name: L'humanité
summary_text: When an 11-year-old girl is brutally raped and murdered in a quiet French village, a police detective who has forgotten how to feel emotions--because of the death of his own family in some kind of accident--investigates the crime, which turns out to ask more questions than it answers.

name: Black God, White Devil
summary_text: After killing his employer when said employer tries to cheat him out of his payment, a man becomes an outlaw and starts following a self-proclaimed saint.

name: Chevalier
summary_text: A fishing trip in the Aegean Sea among a sextet of friends becomes the perfect setting for a relentless contest of male dominance. Everything can spark a fierce competition; but, only one can wear the precious chevalier. Who will it be?

name: Snow White: The Fairest of Them All
summary_text: Snow White's mother dies during childbirth, leaving baby Snow and father John for dead on an icy field, who then receives a visit from one of Satan's representatives, granting him three wishes.

name: Brother Sun, Sister Moon
summary_text: Dramatization of events in the life of St. Francis of Assisi from before his conversion experience through his audience with the pope, including his friendship with St. Clare.

name: Sacrifice
summary_text: After digging up a bizzarly mutilated corpse on her land, physician Tora Hamilton uncovers a lethal connection to ancient pagan rituals.

name: ThanksKilling
summary_text: A homicidal turkey axes off college kids during Thanksgiving break.

name: Mrs. Parker and the Vicious Circle
summary_text: Dorothy Parker remembers the heyday of the Algonquin Round Table, a circle of friends whose barbed wit, like hers, was fueled by alcohol and flirted with despair.

name: Khushi
summary_text: While playing matchmaker to a pair of their friends, two young university students begin developing feelings for each other.

name: Maya Bazaar
summary_text: Balarama promises Subhadra to get his daughter married to her son. But when the Pandavas loses their kingdom to the Kaurava's, Balarama breaks his promise.

name: Leader
summary_text: A well educated idealist, who is a son of Political leader in power wants to correct the rigged political system of favors and corruption. However, this soon becomes a game of power. How ...                See full summary »

name: The Seven-Per-Cent Solution
summary_text: To treat his friend's cocaine induced delusions, Watson lures Sherlock Holmes to Sigmund Freud.

name: Always Shine
summary_text: Two women, with differing degrees of success, travel north from Los Angeles to Big Sur for a weekend vacation. Both see the trip as an opportunity to reconnect after years of competition and jealousy have driven a wedge between them.

name: Harvard Man
summary_text: A basketball player strikes a deal with the mob to fix a basketball game.

name: Belgica
summary_text: The drama follows two brothers who start a bar and get swept up in its success in the midst of Belgium's nightlife scene.

name: He ni zai yi qi
summary_text: A violin prodigy and his father travel to Beijing, where the father seeks the means to his son's success while the son struggles to accept the path laid before him.

name: Rising High
summary_text: Charting the rise and fall of three corrupt real estate agents who accumulate absurd wealth in no time but fall into a vortex of fraud, greed and drugs.

name: Checkered Ninja
summary_text: A possessed Ninja doll teams up with a teenage boy to avenge the murder of a poor child factory worker.

name: Back to Burgundy
summary_text: After a 10 year absence, Jean returns to his hometown when his father falls ill. Reuniting with his sister Juliette and his brother Jérémie, they have to re-build their relationship and trust as a family again.

name: The Last Will and Testament of Rosalind Leigh
summary_text: A young man returns to his recently deceased mother's charming gothic revival home, only to discover a sinister presence lying within that may be linked to a peculiar cult run by two strange brothers.

name: Buffalo Bill and the Indians, or Sitting Bull's History Lesson
summary_text: A cynical Buffalo Bill hires Sitting Bull to exploit him and add his credibility to the distorted view of history presented in his Wild West Show.

name: Den ofrivillige golfaren
summary_text: I bet anyone can get better at golf than you are in one week, a golfer says to her golfing businessman for a boyfriend in a quarrel. Unfortunately Stig-Helmer is standing nearby when the ...                See full summary »

name: Saint Seiya: Legend of Sanctuary
summary_text: Warriors called "Saints" are the champions of hope who have always appeared since the Age of Myth whenever evil threatens the world. In this present day story, many years since the long ...                See full summary »

name: The Girl in the Book
summary_text: Set in the world of New York publishing, a young book editor is forced to confront a troubling chapter from her past when a bestselling author re-enters her life.

name: Sedam i po
summary_text: Everyday lives of people in Belgrade who are obsessed with their weaknesses and led by their passions. Seven independent stories on 7 deadly sins are told in a comical tone.

name: The Cheap Detective
summary_text: San Francisco, 1940, detectives, dames, documents, Nazis, and a treasure.

name: God Forgives... I Don't!
summary_text: After a train is robbed of its payroll, an insurance agent and a card-shark team-up to retrieve the loot from the bandits who guard it at a secret location near the Mexican border.

name: Virus
summary_text: A real life account of the deadly Nipah virus outbreak in Kerala, and the courageous fight put on by several individuals which helped to contain the epidemic.

name: Noriko no shokutaku
summary_text: A teenager called Noriko Shimabara runs away from her family in Tokoyama, to meet Kumiko, the leader of an Internet BBS, Haikyo.com. She becomes involved with Kumiko's "family circle", ...                See full summary »

name: The Battle of Shaker Heights
summary_text: Two high school boys, reenacting historic battles, use learned strategy and team up for war on a school bully. One falls for the other's sister.

name: Prisoner of the Mountains
summary_text: Two Russian soldiers, one battle-seasoned and the other barely into his boots and uniform, are taken prisoner by an anxious Islamic father from a remote village hoping to trade them for his captured son.

name: Chillerama
summary_text: It's the closing night at the last drive-in theatre in America, and manager, Cecil Kaufman's planned to show 4 movies; films so rare, they've never been exhibited publicly on American soil, until tonight.
